items.title: Chicken madras
items.description: Ditch the takeaway menu and cook our healthy chicken madras curry instead. This simple family dinner is full of fragrant spices and tender pieces of chicken

image.alt: Chicken Madras curry in a balti dish with naan bread
image.title: Chicken Madras

items.title: Next level tikka masala
items.description: Who can resist the combination of smoky tandoor-charred chicken in a delicately spiced tomato-based sauce? Master the tikka masala with our ultimate version

image.title: Next-level tikka masala served in a frying pan

items.title: Peanut butter chicken
items.description: The whole family will love this new, budget chicken dish. Any leftovers freeze well and make a handy lunch

items.title: Chicken vindaloo
items.description: Turn up the heat with a homemade chicken vindaloo made with plenty of aromatic spices. Serve with warmed flatbreads for a simple, satisfying supper

image.alt: Chicken vindaloo served with Indian flatbread
image.title: Chicken vindaloo

items.title: Classic butter chicken
items.description: Swap your usual takeaway for homemade butter chicken. The dish is made in two parts, combining tandoori chicken with a rich, buttery sauce

image.alt: Butter chicken in pan with spoon
image.title: BBC Good Food podcast – Rookie & Nice: butter chicken with Nikita Gulhane

items.title: Slow-cooker chicken curry
items.description: Try this easy, one-pot chicken curry that's low-fat, low-calorie and delivers three of your five-a-day. It's slow-cooked so the meat is beautifully tender

image.alt: A dish of slow cooker chicken curry with brown rice
image.title: Slow cooker chicken curry

items.title: Chicken korma
items.description: Want a curry without too many calories? Use fat-free Greek yogurt instead of cream for a healthy korma that will give your local takeaway a run for its money

image.alt: Plate of chicken korma with basmati rice
image.title: Easy chicken korma

items.title: Slow-cooker chicken korma
items.description: Make a mild and creamy korma in the slow cooker. Sure to become a family favourite, slow cooking ensures tender chicken and a rich, fragrant curry sauce

image.alt: Slow cooker chicken korma served in a pan
image.title: Slow cooker chicken korma

items.title: Chicken jalfrezi
items.description: Instead of calling the Indian takeaway, make your own easy chicken jalfrezi. This curry is also healthy with two of your 5-a-day and a dose of vitamin C

image.alt: Chicken curry with red chillies in silver bowl on wooden board
image.title: Chicken jalfrezi

items.title: Home-style chicken curry
items.description: A rustic and authentic quick Indian one-pot packed with tonnes of hot Asian spices and fragrant coriander.

image.alt: Home-style chicken curry in a deep dish with fork
image.title: Home-style chicken curry

items.title: Chinese chicken curry
items.description: Cook an easy, healthy curry with just 15 minutes preparation. Serve this replica of your favourite takeaway dish with fluffy rice for a wholesome family meal

image.alt: Chicken curry wth rice and peas in bowls, with chopsticks alongside
image.title: Chinese chicken curry

items.title: Singapore-style nyonya curry
items.description: GF member Suzanne Bloor shares her go-to Friday night dish: a simplified chicken curry with South East Asian influences. Ideal for a family of four

image.alt: Singapore-style nyonya curry served with rice
image.title: Singapore-style nyonya curry

items.title: Easy chicken curry
items.description: This easy staple chicken curry is a fantastic recipe for family dinners. It's made with just a handful of ingredients and is enriched with creamy yogurt

image.alt: Chicken curry with rice on plate
image.title: Easy chicken curry

items.title: Sali murghi
items.description: Cook up a chicken curry packed with spices and a bit of sweetness from apricots and jaggery, an unrefined cane sugar. Serve with 'sali' – potato matchsticks

items.title: Thai green chicken curry
items.description: Don't call the local takeaway – impress friends and family by cooking this fragrant and creamy Thai green chicken curry. It's easy and quick to make

image.alt: Thai green chicken curry in a wok
image.title: Thai green chicken curry

items.title: Chicken tikka masala
items.description: This takeaway favourite is freezer-friendly and quick to reheat, giving you the chance to get ahead and save money.

image.alt: Chicken tikka masala with rice on a plate
image.title: Chicken tikka masala

items.title: Easy butter chicken
items.description: Fancy a healthy version of your favourite Friday night chicken curry? The chicken can be marinaded the day before so you can get ahead on your prep

items.title: Katsu curry wrap
items.description: Your favourite katsu curry in wrap form, ready in minutes! This simple supper is full of flavour, golden brown chicken and needs just 4 ingredients

items.title: Cashew curry
items.description: This easy low-carb lunch is packed with iron rich veggies, crunchy cashews and chicken. Serve with your favourite steamed greens and a scattering of coriander

items.title: Cardamom chicken with lime leaves
items.description: If you're a true curry lover, the layers of spice in this fragrant and tender chicken thigh curry will really hit the spot

items.title: Keralan chicken coconut ishtu
items.description: Anjum Anand adds green beans and spinach to this creamy chicken curry to make a flavourful one-pot meal - serve alongside rice, paratha, naan or rice noodles for a special supper

items.title: John's Thai chicken curry
items.description: The raw beansprouts add great texture to this dish and the fresh chilli adds a fiery heat. If you like it extra hot, serve with a spicy Thai chilli sauce

items.title: Mauritian chicken curry
items.description: Try this fragrant Mauritian chicken curry with potatoes. It's served with a spiced tomato side dish along with fluffy basmati rice and rotis

image.alt: A plate serving chicken curry garnished with red onions
image.title: Mauritian chicken curry

items.title: Cardamom butter chicken
items.description: A homemade curry to rival your favourite Indian takeaway - a rich blend of spices mixed with creamy ghee

items.title: Fruity Caribbean curry
items.description: Kidney beans and veg make chicken drumsticks go further with this sweet and hot curry - pack in 4 of your 5 a day in a filling family meal

items.title: Cape Malay chicken curry with yellow rice
items.description: Spice up chicken thighs in a South African curry, packed with flavourful spices and served with a side of sweet, fragrant rice

image.alt: Cape Malay chicken curry with yellow rice
image.title: Cape Malay chicken curry with yellow rice

items.title: Chicken curry with lime leaf, lemongrass & mango
items.description: Use a fragrant curry paste as the base for this Asian curry with tropical fruit and citrussy notes

image.alt: Chicken curry with lime leaf, lemongrass & mango
image.title: Chicken curry with lime leaf, lemongrass & mango

items.title: Healthier chicken balti
items.description: A lighter version of the Indian takeaway classic from Angela Nilsen, this tomato-based curry is packed with extra spinach and peppers

items.title: Chicken, sweet potato & coconut curry
items.description: Serve this mildly spiced curry with rice noodles, basmati rice or chappati breads and introduce your kids to curry

items.title: Creamy chicken & mango curry
items.description: Use korma paste, turmeric and black onion seeds as the base for this mild, Indian spice-pot, made creamy with coconut milk

items.title: Slow cooker chicken tikka masala
items.description: Get this chicken tikka masala cooking in the morning and have dinner waiting for you when you get in – it's perfect for a cold winter evening.

image.alt: Slow cooker chicken tikka masala served with rice and naan bread
image.title: Slow cooker chicken tikka masala

items.title: Speedy green chicken curry
items.description: The definition of curry in a hurry, try this fragrant Thai spice-pot with chicken, green beans, basil and basmati rice

items.title: Low-fat chicken biryani
items.description: This fragrant Indian chicken curry with rice topping has half the fat of your normal takeaway, and it's low calorie

items.title: Family meals: Mild chicken curry
items.description: A mildly-spiced curry with a rich yogurt sauce that will appeal to adults and kids alike

items.title: Chicken & sweet potato curry
items.description: This Indian spice pot flavoured with korma paste is mild enough for kids- the sweet potato stretches it a little further

items.title: Lighter massaman chicken curry
items.description: Another takeaway favourite gets a healthy makeover - this creamy Thai curry now has half the fat with all the aromatic flavour

items.title: Proper chicken curry
items.description: Impress with this tandoori masala-spiced Indian dish with peppers, coconut and fresh coriander

items.title: Chicken tikka with spiced rice
items.description: Indian food needn't be a guilty pleasure - this healthy baked chicken with fragrant, fresh rice is nutritious and flavoursome

items.title: Healthy chicken katsu curry
items.description: This healthier katsu is coated in finely chopped flaked almonds and baked in the oven (rather than fried) until crisp and golden. If you're following the Healthy Diet Plan then this a great dish to add to your repertoire

items.title: Cumin-scented chicken curry
items.description: This curry improves if you make it ahead, it gives the flavours time to mingle

items.title: Coconut & tamarind chicken curry
items.description: This creamy tropical Indian one-pot is perfect for an informal, help-yourself dinner party with friends

items.title: Chicken & vegetable curry
items.description: This Indian feast has a healthy vegetable count and is a really simple everyday supper

items.title: Nutty chicken curry
items.description: Fast and flavoursome, this creamy chicken curry is ready in under 20 minutes

items.title: Chicken, potato & green bean curry
items.description: This mild, creamy curry is a superhealthy way to start the week. Serve with naan breads warm from the oven

items.title: Afghan-style chicken korma with dried sour plums
items.description: Add dried sour plums to this Afghan-inspired curry to impart an interesting salty, sour flavour. If you can’t get them, use dried sour cherries instead

image.alt: Afghan-style chicken korma with dried sour plums served with rice
image.title: Afghan-style chicken korma with dried sour plums

items.title: Sweet potato & chicken curry
items.description: Chicken thighs are good value and tasty, just right for this healthy, versatile curry

items.title: Chicken biryani pilau
items.description: Easy and cheap to recreate at home, students won't need to order takeaways ever again!

items.title: Creamy masala chicken
items.description: A mild chicken curry with oodles of flavour

items.title: Thai chicken curry
items.description: Learn how to make an authentic-tasting Thai chicken curry with this easy step-by-step recipe

items.title: Ginger chicken
items.description: This zingy curry is must-make recipe and only takes 50 minutes, fresher than your local take away and much healthier too

items.title: Palm nut & chicken curry
items.description: This Ghanaian palm nut and chicken curry is pepped up with a dose of scotch bonnet chilli. Serve with white rice balls for an authentic street food dish

image.alt: A black plate serving palm nut & chicken curry
image.title: Palm nut & chicken curry

items.title: Easy Thai green chicken curry
items.description: John Torode's green curry is fresh, fragrant and hot - for a vibrant green colour, serve as soon as the chicken is cooked

image.alt: Bowl of Thai green chicken & aubergine curry
image.title: Easy Thai green chicken curry
